#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define sz(_v) (int)(_v).size()
#define all(_v) (_v).begin(),(_v).end()
#define pii pair<int,int>
typedef long long ll;
const int INF = 1000000000;
const ll MOD = 1e9 + 7;

const int maxn = 100010;
char s[maxn];

int main() {
	//ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	
	int t; cin >> t;
	while (t --) {
	    ll x1,y1,x2,y2; cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
		ll a1,b1,a2,b2; cin >> a1 >> b1 >> a2 >> b2;
		
		ll ans = abs(x1 - x2) * abs(y1 - y2) + abs(a1 - a2) * abs(b1 - b2);

		if((y1 > b2) or (a1 > x2) or (a2 < x1) or (b1 > y2)) cout << ans << "\n";
		else {
			ll xx = max(a1,x1);
			ll yy = max(y1,b1);
			ll aa = min(a2,x2);
			ll bb = min(y2,b2);
			ll diff = abs(xx - aa) * abs(yy - bb);
			cout << ans - diff << "\n";
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
